title: Banned because of Riots problem
body:
Weâ€™re aware that some players are receiving connection errors when loading into a game. If you get disconnected during loading screen and see a prompt to reconnect, please click the CANCEL button out of the error pop up and use the RECONNECT button on the client screen to quickly get back into the game.

I did this and it did not work and i have 10 games of 20 min wait before queue. Every single game this happens,what can i do?

replies.body:
Your escalated period in the lower priority queue suggests a history of leaving games, so there may be some more serious issues going on here than the current [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na).  An account won't receive a [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) with just one leave, and it won't receive an escalation until it's left many.  

It's really important in this case that you resolve whatever is causing you to leave, so I suggest going through each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to work that out.  Be sure to test it in custom games to make sure your connection can hold on.  Good luck!

I have done all this and yet you guys still refuse to even respond or lift my low priority queue. I dont mean to sound rude, just going home after work to see your favorite game punish me for reasons that are not my fault is not very fun.

In replies to this I have had connection problems in the past as well but since then learned off of it. Moved off of Hawaii islands and to the mainland and still go to gaming cafes here to ensure I don't go through my dc habits. Now I do understand I have a history but if you look at the gaps between the last time I had actually left a game has been quite a while. Also did not expect this while I pay my way to better connection and Higher elos. Please let us know on future developments for this problem or why it is happening because it is not a connection problem from our end if this much people are having this occur so suddenly.{{item:3187}} {{item:3187}}
I had a five game lower priority before bc of the problem with the start but right it was my last game i got another one because of the problem

What concerns me most is that by the time the reconnection is done, the players would have already proposed a remake and the whole thing will be over before I have time to reconnect. This has happened 3 times in a row, and I'm quite frustrated with the leaverbuster.

Connection issues were not a problem. Can you find the source of the connection issues occurring in the first place?
